title: Do female teachers find their male students attractive? - Quora

response.answer_text: In general I would say no, but it does depend on age. I have once in a while found some older students attractive, certainly, but I would never ever act or show such a thing, much in the same way that I would survive daily life finding random people attractive and moving on with my day. Even when I teach adults (some of whom are even older than myself) I have never once shown or acted upon any attraction I have for them because they are my students and my role as teacher pushes aside everything else.

Personally I don’t think they would I think that teachers have self control I don’t believe that teachers are attracted to their students and even if they were they wouldn’t show that they were. think about it teachers see hundreds of male and female students you would think they would become numb to feeling of attraction to their students. just my opinion.
